verses.content: Chun, Pathienin Noa le a naupasalhai chu mal a sâwm a, an kuomah, “Chi tamtak inthlain hung pung unla, hnuoi hi hluo sip ro.
Nangni ṭîna le pawisakna hnuoia sa tinrêng le chunglêng vate tinrêngin nei an ta; chuonghai le hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn po po le, tuisuorieta nga po pohai chu, in kuta pêk an ni vawng tah.
Thilhring chângthei tinrênghai chu in ta dingin fâk ding nîng an ta; thlai hring ka pêk ang cheu khan iengkim ka pêk vawng cheu.
Amiruokchu, sa a hringna (a thisen) pumin in fâk ding a ni nawh.

Chun, in thisen, in hringna phuba chu la ngei ngei ka tih; sa tinrêng chunga chun lâng ka tih, mihriem kuoma inthawk khawmin, mi tin an unauhaia inthawk chun, mihriem hringna phuba chu la seng ka tih.
Tukhawm mihriem thisen in- suotu chu mihriem vêkin ama thisen chu an insuo ve ding a nih: Pathienin ama angpuiin mihriem a siem sih a.
Chun, nangni chu chi tamtak inthlain hung pung ro; hnuoia hin nau tamtak nei unla, a chunga hin hung pung ro,” a ta.
Chun, Pathienin Noa le a kuoma um a naupasalhai kuoma chun,
“Ngai ta u, keima ngeiin in kuoma le in hnunga in thlahai kuoma khawm ka thuthlung chu ka sukdet a nih;
in kuoma thilhring tinrêng um, in umpui vate dâm, ran dâm, ramsa tinrêng kuoma dâm khawm; lawnga inthawka hung suok po po, hnuoia sa tinrêng kuoma chen khawm.
In kuomah ka thuthlung chu ka sukdet a; tisa po po tuilêta sukbo- hmangin um ta naw ni hai a, hnuoi sukse dingin tui lêt nâwk ta naw bawk a tih,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Pathien bawkin, “Hi hi kei le nangni le in kuoma thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng umhai kâra, suon tâwp loa um peihai ta dingin, ka thuthlung inchikna chu a nih.
Sûmah ka sumrisâng kân zâmtir a, chu chu kei le hnuoi inkâra thuthlung inchikna ding nîng a tih.
Chun, hieng hi nîng a ta, hnuoi chunga sûm kân zâmtirin sumrisâng chu sûma chun inlang a ta,
kei le nangni le tisa po po laia thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng inkâra ka thuthlung hi hre zing ka tih. Chuongchun, tui chu tisa po po sukbohmang dingin hung lêt nâwk ta naw nih.

Chun, sumrisâng chu sûmah inzâm hlak a ta; chuongchun, Pathien le hnuoi chunga tisa um po po laia thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng inkârah kumkhaw thuthlung um chu ka hriet zing theina dingin en hlak ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Pathien bawkin, Noa kuoma chun, “Chu chu kei le hnuoi chunga tisa um po po inkâra thuthlung sukdetna inchikna a nih,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, Noa naupasal lawnga inthawka suokhai chu Sem, Ham, le Japheth an nih: Ham chu Kanaan pa a nih.
Chuonghai pathum chu Noa naupasalhai an na: chuonghaia inthawka suokhai chun hnuoi po po hi an dâp zo tah a nih.
Noa chu hnuoi inlettu hmasa- tak a nih a, Grêp huon a siem a,
uoin chu a dâwn a, ân rui a: chuongchun, a puon inah puon boin a zâl a.
Chun, Ham, Kanaan pa chun a pa saruokna chu a hmuh a, tuola a unauhai pahni chu a hril a.
Chuongchun, Sem le Japheth chun puon an lâk a, liengkoa inzâwnin hnungtâwlin an feh a, an pa saruokna chu an inkhum tah a; an hmai chu khingtieng nghain a um a, an pa saruokna chu an hmu nawh a.
Noa chu a uoin inrui chu a hung har a, a naupasal naupang takin a chunga a thawzie chu a hung hriet tah a.
Chuongchun, “Kanaan chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se; A unauhai siehlawhai siehlaw nîng a tih,” a ta.
“LALPA, Sem Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se. Kanaan chu Sem siehlawah um raw se
Pathienin Japheth chu suklien sienla, Sem puon inhaiah um raw se; Kanaan chu a siehlawah um raw se,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, Noa chu tuilêt hnung chun kum za thum sâwmnga a dam a.
Noa dam sûng po po chu kum za kuo le sâwmnga a na; chun a thi tah a.
